properties.sql: select   personName as name,organization, person_and_org   from temp where  person_and_org not in (select person_and_org  from yancao.person)

select    id code,TITLE  as name,ISBN as isbn,PUB_ADDR as place_pub,PUB_DATE as year_pub,CON_INT as content_intro,PUBLISHER as person_publication,PRICE as project,WOR_NUM as k_word,PAGE_NUM as page_no,FORMAT as size,cast(YEAR as int) as year,author1 as author  from temp
select  code as person_id,person_and_org  from temp
select *   from yancao.person
select * from yancao.dg_book
select   code,personName,person_and_org  from temp

SELECT id AS code, split ( CHI_EDI_TRA_NAME, ';' ) [ 0 ] AS personName,'' AS organization,concat( split ( CHI_EDI_TRA_NAME, ';' ) [ 0 ], '|', '' ) AS person_and_org  FROM temp  WHERE CHI_EDI_TRA_NAME IS NOT NULL  AND split ( CHI_EDI_TRA_NAME, ';' ) [ 0 ]!= '' and length(split ( CHI_EDI_TRA_NAME, ';' ) [ 0 ])<=3
select  code as book_id,person_id  from temp
select code as id,concat(personName,'|',person_id) as author1  from  temp
select organization,person_name,standard_id, author_sequence from temp group by   organization,person_name,standard_id, author_sequence
select a.code as person_id,a.standard_id,a.author_sequence from temp a
select person_id,code,case when person_name is null then '' else person_name end  person_name from temp
select a.org_id as organization_id,a.standard_id,a.author_sequence from temp a
select nor_name   organization,nor_person_name    person_name,standard_id,author_sequence  from temp
select  organization,person_name,standard_id, min(author_sequence) author_sequence  from temp  group    by   organization,person_name,standard_id

select a.uuid as code,a.person_name name,case when org_id is null then '' else concat(trim(a.organization),"|",trim(a.org_id)) end  org_name,a.per_org  person_and_org,'0' publish_paper_num,'0' paper_quote_num,'0' influence_score,'0' impact_on_award,'0' impact_patent,'0' impact_paper,'0' impact_on_standard,'0'  impact_on_project,'0'  impact_on_book from tt1 a
SELECT id,dra_bod_name,main_dra_name FROM temp where size(split(dra_bod_name,';'))<=size(split(main_dra_name,';')) and main_dra_name is not null
select code org_id,name org_name from yancao.org
select id as code,year  from temp
select  person_name,org_id,organization,per_org from temp group by   person_name,org_id,organization,per_org
SELECT a.*,b.code org_id from temp a left join yancao.org b on trim(a.organization)=trim(b.name)
select organization as name from temp where organization!='' and org_id is null group by organization
select * from yancao.dg_standard_2
SELECT code,person_and_org from yancao.person
select id as code,language as LITERATURE_GENRE,DOC_REF as STANDARD_NO,STA_NAME as NAME,ENG_STA_NAME as EN_STANDARD_NAME,SUMMARY as abs,KEYWORDS as KEYWORD,FUL_TEX_ID as PDF_PATH,sta_level  from temp
SELECT a.author_sequence,a.standard_id,trim(a.organization) organization,a.person_name,concat(trim(a.person_name),"|",trim(a.organization)) per_org from  temp a
select   organization_id,standard_id,min(author_sequence)   author_sequence    from  temp group by  organization_id,standard_id
select b.code org_id,b.name organization from yancao.org b
select a.*,case when org_id is null then '' else concat(trim(a.organization),"|",trim(a.org_id)) end  org_name,a.per_org    person_and_org from  temp a
select organization_id org_id,standard_id code from yancao.standard_org
select code as person_id,name as person_name from yancao.person
select person_id,standard_id as code from yancao.standard_person
select a.* from temp a left join yancao.person b on trim(a.person_and_org)=trim(b.person_and_org) where b.person_and_org is null
select ach_id,fruit_id,person,concat(org_type,'灬',org_nname)  org_nname from  temp where org_type='11310002'
select  fruit_id,ach_id,person,concat_ws(';',collect_list(org_nname ))  org_name from temp group by  fruit_id,ach_id,person
select person_id code,person_name  name,person_and_org from temp group by   person_id,person_name,person_and_org

SELECT ach_id,  person,  library_classification,  abs,  study_content,  name,  keyword,  `sort`,  technic,  attribute,  phase,  level1 as `level`,  study_format,  tobacco_study_sort,  register_id,  star_date,  end_date,  evaluate_idea,  appraisal_situation,  ach_id as code,  award,  organization_completed,  organization_cooperative from  temp
select name from temp
select  person_name,person_and_org from temp group by person_name,person_and_org
SELECT ACH_ID,nor_name  ORG_NNAME,ORG_ADRESS,org_type from temp
select a.code,a.name from  temp a  left  join  yancao.keyword b  on  a.name=b.name  where  b.name  is  null

select     AUT_NAME person ,ACH_ID ,CN_LIB_CLA as LIBRARY_CLASSIFICATION ,RESULT_INT abs ,RES_CON STUDY_CONTENT ,ACH_NAME name ,KEYWORDS KEYWORD ,RES_TYPE SORT ,RESULT_EMB TECHNIC ,RESULT_PRO ATTRIBUTE ,RESULT_STAGE PHASE ,ACH_LEVEL LEVEL1 ,RES_FORM as STUDY_FORMAT ,TOB_CLA TOBACCO_STUDY_SORT ,DOC_NUM REGISTER_ID ,START_DATE star_DATE ,END_DATE END_DATE  from temp
SELECT ACH_ID,EVA_OPI as EVALUATE_IDEA,EVA_OPI  as  APPRAISAL_SITUATION  FROM temp
select  org_nname,ACH_ID,case when org_type is null then '' else org_type end org_type   from temp
select org_id,org_name,max(address) address  from temp  group by org_id,org_name,address
select * from  temp

select case when  b.code is null  then a.uuid  else b.code end  as   person_id,a.person_name,a.person_and_org from temp a left join yancao.person b on a.person_name=b.name and a.person_and_org=b.person_and_org
select ach_id,org_name,org_id,org_type from temp group by ach_id,org_name,org_id,org_type
select a.*   from temp a left join  yancao.person b   on a.person_and_org =b.person_and_org  where b.person_and_org  is null
select code as keyword_id ,name from yancao.keyword
select person_id,fruit_id,author_sequence  from temp  group by   person_id,fruit_id,author_sequence
SELECT ORG_NNAME as name,ORG_ADRESS as address,org_type FROM temp
select ach_id,concat_ws(',',collect_list(org)) ORGANIZATION_COMPLETED from (select ach_id,concat(org_name,'|',org_id) org from temp where org_type='11310002') a group by ach_id
SELECT ACH_ID fruit_id,ORG_NNAME org_name  from temp  where  org_type='11310003'
select code as fruit_id,name  from  temp
select ach_id,concat_ws(',',collect_list(person)) ACCOMPLISHER  from (select ach_id,concat(person_name,'|',person_id) person from temp) a  group by ach_id
SELECT org_id as code,org_name as name,address  from temp
select   ACH_ID,concat(concat(concat(AWARD_LEVEL,AWARD_GRADE),','),AWARD_CLASS) as award from  temp
select ach_id,concat_ws(',',collect_list(org)) ORGANIZATION_COOPERATIVE from (select ach_id,concat(org_name,'|',org_id) org from temp where org_type='11310003') a   group by ach_id

select  code                 ,                                    project_name         ,                                    literature_no        ,                                    literature_type      ,                                    library_classification ,                                    source_project       ,                                    organization_completed ,                                    organization_cooperative ,                                    collection_no        ,                                    accomplisher         ,                                    appraisal_situation  ,                                    award                ,                                    abs                  ,                                    pdf_path             ,                                    evaluation_point     ,                                    study_content        ,                                    evaluate_idea        ,                                    name                 ,                                    keyword              ,                                    sort                 ,                                    technic              ,                                    strandard            ,                                    attribute            ,                                    phase                ,                                    level                ,                                    study_format         ,                                    sort_code1           ,                                    sort_code2           ,                                    tobacco_study_sort   ,                                    register_id          ,                                    org_id               ,                                    star_date            ,                                    end_date             ,                                    commend_org          ,                                    subj_source          ,                                    split ( end_date, '-' )[0] year,                                    rank                 ,                                    award_rank           ,                                    award_sort_int         from temp
select fruit_id,keyword_id  from  temp
select  a.*   from  temp  a  left  join  yancao.org  b   on  a.name=b.name  where  b.name  is  null  and a.name!=''
select  ACH_ID fruit_id,ACH_ID,person from temp
select * from  yancao.dg_ach_eva
select  name,max(address) address from temp group  by name
select * from yancao.dg_ach_info
select * from yancao.dg_ach_award
select * from  yancao.dg_ach_org where org_nname is not null and org_nname!=''
select org_id  as organization_id,fruit_id  from temp  where org_id is not null
select org_id  as organization_id,fruit_id,min(author_sequence)    author_sequence from (select * from temp where  org_type='11310002') a  group  by org_id,fruit_id
select code,ct as name from (select code,ct from   temp LATERAL view explode(split(keyword,';'))  t  as ct) a where ct!='' and ct!='null' and ct is not null
select case when  b.code is null then a.uuid else  b.code end org_id,a.name org_name,a.address from tty  a left join yancao.org b  on a.name=b.name
select a.*,case when org_id is null then '' else concat(trim(a.organization),"|",trim(a.org_id)) end  org_name, a.per_org  person_and_org from  temp a
select a.* from temp a left join yancao.person b on trim(a.person_and_org)=trim(b.person_and_org) where b.person_and_org is null
select a.code as person_id,a.patent_id,a.author_sequence  from temp a

select  a.code ,a.`type` ,a.patent_number ,a.publish_date ,a.proposer ,a.address ,a.classification ,a.apply_date ,a.name ,a.APPLY_PATENT_NUMBER ,a.PRIORITY ,a.INTERNATIONAL ,a.INTERNATIONAL_PUB ,a.INTRODUCTION_DATE ,a.`abs` ,a.PDF_PATH  from temp a
select a.org_id as organization_id,a.patent_id,a.author_sequence    from temp a
select id as code from temp
select a.code,b.person_id from temp a left  join  yancao.patent_person b  on trim(a. code)=trim(b.patent_id)
select organization_id,patent_id,min(author_sequence) author_sequence from temp group by organization_id,patent_id
select organization,person_name,patent_id, author_sequence from temp group by  organization,person_name,patent_id, author_sequence
select person_id,patent_id,author_sequence from temp group by person_id,patent_id,author_sequence

select  code,concat_ws(',',collect_set(ab))  deviser  from (select a.code ,concat(b.name,'|',a.person_id) as ab  from  temp  a   left  join  yancao.person  b  on  trim(a.person_id)=trim(b.code) )  c group  by code
select  design_man inventer,apply_man_auto proposer,id code from temp
select person_name,org_id,organization,per_org from temp group by  person_name,org_id,organization,per_org
select person_name,nor_name organization,patent_id,author_sequence from temp
select b.code org_id,b.name organization from yancao.org b
select person_name,regexp_replace(organization,';','') organization,patent_id,author_sequence from temp
SELECT code,person_and_org from yancao.person
SELECT a.*,concat(a.person_name,"|",a.organization) per_org,b.code org_id from temp a left join yancao.org b on trim(a.organization)=trim(b.name)
select organization as name from temp where organization!='' and org_id is null group by organization

select id as code,patent_type type,pub_num patent_number,pub_date publish_date,apply_man_auto proposer,apply_man_address address,ipc_auto classification,apply_date apply_date,design_man deviser,name name,apply_num APPLY_PATENT_NUMBER,PRIORITY PRIORITY,INTERNATIONAL_APPLY INTERNATIONAL,INTERNAATIONAL_PUB INTERNATIONAL_PUB,ENTER_COUNTRY_DATE  INTRODUCTION_DATE,REMARK abs,DOC_FILE PDF_PATH  from  temp
SELECT a.author_sequence,a.patent_id,trim(a.organization) organization,a.person_name,concat(trim(a.person_name),"|",trim(a.organization)) per_org from  temp a

select  code                 ,                                   type_flag            ,                                   name                 ,                                   patent_number        ,                                   apply_date           ,                                   publish_date         ,                                   patent_accreditdate  ,                                   classification       ,                                   abs                  ,                                   deviser              ,                                   proposer             ,                                   from_unixtime ( unix_timestamp ( publish_date, 'yyyyMMdd' ), 'yyyy' ) year,                                   type                 ,                                   paper_id             ,                                   paper_type           ,                                   joint_proposer       ,                                   address              ,                                   source               ,                                   priority             ,                                   international        ,                                   international_pub    ,                                   introduction_date    ,                                   keywords             ,                                   pdf_path             ,                                   fruit                       from temp

select a.uuid as code,a.person_name name,case when org_id is null then '' else concat(trim(a.organization),"|",trim(a.org_id)) end  org_name,a.per_org  person_and_org,'0' publish_paper_num,'0' paper_quote_num,'0' influence_score,'0' impact_on_award,'0' impact_patent,'0' impact_paper,'0' impact_on_standard,'0'  impact_on_project,'0'  impact_on_book from tt1 a
select * from yancao.dg_patent

select a.code,a.`type`,a.patent_number,a.publish_date,concat(a.proposer,'|',b.code) proposer,a.address,a.classification,a.apply_date,a.deviser,a.name,a.APPLY_PATENT_NUMBER,a.PRIORITY,a.INTERNATIONAL,a.INTERNATIONAL_PUB,a.INTRODUCTION_DATE,a.`abs`,PDF_PATH  from temp a left join yancao.org b on trim(a.proposer)=trim(b.name)
select * from test.keyword_pape
select * from yancao.paper_person_csv
select * from yancao.paper_ref_csv
select * from yancao.paper_org_csv
select * from yancao.paper_keyword_csv
select * from yancao.paper_en_keyword_csv
select * from test.en_keyword_pape
select * from test.paper
select * from test.org_pape
select * from test.person_pape
SELECT author_ids,author_names,id from temp where author_ids is not null
SELECT author_org_ids,author_org_names,id from temp  where author_org_ids is not null
select code,language from  temp
select ID as id_1,TITLE,AUTHOR_NAMES from   temp
select id,case when  person_id_name  is  null then personName else person_id_name end personName,   organization  from temp
select code,name from temp

SELECT  code                    ,  '' paper_id                ,  paper_type                ,  lanuage  language          ,  classification             ,  author                     ,  org_name                   ,  name                    ,  alternative                , source                         , '' collection_number           ,  abstract                ,     pdf_path                   ,  abstract_alternative    ,  keyword                    , doi                            , ''  journal_id                 , ''  journal_title_alternative , issn                        , ''  issue_id                ,  issue_volume            ,  issue                    , '' fund_id                    , fund_name                 ,  one_classification        ,  two_classification        , ''  three_classification       , issue_year                    , reference_num                  , '' `range `   from temp
select id,case when  person_id_name  is  null then personName else person_id_name end personName,   organization  from temp
select ref_ids  ref_id,case when id is null then id_1 else id  end paper_ref_id from temp
select  id,REF_ID from temp LATERAL view  explode(split(REF_IDS,';')) t  as REF_ID
select * from yancao.dg_paper
select * from  yancao.dg_paper

select code,                       paper_id             ,          paper_type           ,                       language             ,                       classification       ,                       author               ,                       org_name             ,                       name,                       alternative          ,                       source               ,                       collection_number    ,                       abstract             ,                       pdf_path             ,                       abstract_alternative ,                       keyword              ,                       doi ,                       journal_id           ,                       journal_title_alternative ,                                   issn,                                   issue_id             ,                      issue_volume         ,                                   issue                ,                                   fund_id              ,                                   fund_name            ,                                   one_classification   ,                                   two_classification   ,                                   three_classification ,                                   issue_year           , reference_num zw_reference,                                                    range         from  temp
select id as personName,paper_id,name  from temp
select paper_ref_id code,count(1) reference_num  from (select paper_ref_id from  yancao.paper_ref_csv where paper_ref_id is not null) a group by paper_ref_id
SELECT id paper_id,paper_ref_id from temp
select paper_id,organization_id,index  from temp  where organization_id is not null

select  code , paper_id , paper_type  , classification , author , org_name , name , alternative , source , collection_number , abstract , pdf_path , abstract_alternative , keyword , doi , journal_id , journal_title_alternative , issn , issue_id , issue_volume , issue , fund_id , fund_name , one_classification , two_classification , three_classification , issue_year , reference_num , range from  temp
SELECT   org_id AS organization, NAME name FROM  yancao.dg_organization
select paper_id,concat(personName,'|',organization)  as person_and_org,index,personName  from temp
SELECT person_id AS personName, NAME NAME FROM   yancao.DG_AUTHOR
select person_and_org,code as person_id from temp
select * from test.tt_pps
select * from test.tt_pps_1
SELECT person_id AS personName, name AS NAME FROM yancao.DG_DEGREE_AUTHOR
SELECT   case when name is null then personName else name end personName  , organization  ,paper_id  ,index    from temp
select  personName  as name,organization,concat(personName,'|',organization)  as person_and_org  from temp

SELECT id, AUTHOR_IDS  FROM temp WHERE AUTHOR_IDS IS NOT NULL  AND AUTHOR_IDS!='' AND paper_type = '期刊' UNION ALL SELECT id, AUTHOR_IDS  FROM temp WHERE AUTHOR_IDS IS NOT NULL AND AUTHOR_IDS!='' AND paper_type = '会议'
select paper_id,person_id,index  from temp  where person_id is not null

SELECT id, AUTHOR_ORG_IDS org_id  FROM temp WHERE AUTHOR_ORG_IDS IS NOT NULL  and  AUTHOR_ORG_IDS!=''  AND paper_type = '期刊' UNION ALL SELECT id, AUTHOR_ORG_IDS org_id  FROM temp WHERE AUTHOR_ORG_IDS IS NOT NULL  and  AUTHOR_ORG_IDS!='' AND paper_type = '会议'
select  paper_id,organization,min(index)  index  from temp group by   paper_id,organization
select a.organization as name  from temp a left join (select name  from yancao.org) b on trim(a.organization)=trim(b.name) where b.name is null
select id, org_id org_id_name from temp
select  id as paper_id,record as name from temp lateral view explode(split(KEYWORDS,';')) recordTable as record
select  distinct(a.name) name from temp a left join (select  name  from yancao.keyword) b on trim(a.name)=trim(b.name) where b.name is null
select  code,name,'0' as flag,'论文' as  source  from temp
SELECT  personName ,case when name is null then organization else name end organization ,paper_id ,index   from temp
select  nor_person_name personName  ,nor_name as  organization ,paper_id ,index   from temp
select *   from yancao.person
select id, AUTHOR_IDS    person_id_name from temp

SELECT   REPLACE ( REPLACE ( TITLE, chr( 10 ), '' ), chr( 13 ), '' ) TITLE  ,REPLACE ( REPLACE ( AUTHOR_NAMES, chr( 10 ), '' ), chr( 13 ), '' )  AUTHOR_NAMES  ,REPLACE ( REPLACE ( DOI, chr( 10 ), '' ), chr( 13 ), '' )  DOI  ,REPLACE ( REPLACE ( DATA_TYPE, chr( 10 ), '' ), chr( 13 ), '' )  DATA_TYPE  ,REPLACE ( REPLACE ( ID, chr( 10 ), '' ), chr( 13 ), '' )  REF_IDS    from   DG_REFERENCE
select *   from yancao.org
select *   from yancao.keyword
SELECT TITLE,AUTHOR_NAMES,DOI,DATA_TYPE, REF_IDS from temp where DATA_TYPE='J'   or    DATA_TYPE='C'  or  DATA_TYPE='D'
select  t1.code as code,t1.classification   as classification,t2.*  from temp t1 cross join yancao.subject t2
select  id,id as paper_id, personName,   organization  from temp   where personName is not null  and personName!=''
select  code as keyword_id,name  from temp
select id, person_id  person_id_name from temp where person_id is not null and person_id!=''
select paper_id,keyword_id  from temp
select code,subject_name,(case when classification between st and ed then 1 end) as t  from  temp  where i='1'
select  code,subject_name as one_classification  from temp where t=1
select id, AUTHOR_IDS person_id from temp where paper_type='学位'
select ID,DOI from temp
select code as organization_id,name as organization from temp
SELECT DOI,TITLE,AUTHOR_NAMES,REF_IDS     from temp
select  case when name is null then personName else name end personName ,organization,paper_id,index   from temp

SELECT id AS CODE, paper_type, TITLE AS NAME, ENG_TIT AS alternative, ABS AS abstract, ENG_ABS AS abstract_alternative, LANG AS lanuage, CLC AS classification, FILE_PDF_ID AS pdf_path, DOI AS doi, ISSN AS issn, YEAR AS issue_year, VOLUME AS issue_volume, ISSUE AS issue, FUND AS fund_name, KEYWORDS AS keyword, reference_num, JOURNAL_NAME as source   FROM  temp
select code,concat_ws(',',collect_set(name)) as author from (select paper_id as code,index,concat(personName,'|',person_id) as name from  temp order by index ) t1    group by code
select  id,AUTHOR_NAMES as  personName,if(AUTHOR_ORG_NAMES is null,'',AUTHOR_ORG_NAMES) as organization from temp where AUTHOR_NAMES  is not null
select code,subject_name,(case when classification between st and ed then 1 end) as t  from  temp  where i='2'
select code,concat_ws(',',collect_set(name)) as org_name from (select paper_id as code,index,concat(organization,'|',organization_id) as name from  temp order by index) t1    group by code
select  code,subject_name as two_classification  from temp where t=1
select id as organization,paper_id,name  from temp
select id, personName,case when  org_id_name  is  null then organization else org_id_name end   organization  from temp
select  code as person_id,organization_id from temp  where organization_id is not null
select a.name,a.organization,a.person_and_org  from temp a left join (select  person_and_org  from  yancao.person) b  on trim(a.person_and_org)=trim(b.person_and_org) where b.person_and_org  is null
select  personName    ,case when name is null then organization else name end organization   ,paper_id,index   from temp
select  code,name,person_and_org,if(concat(organization,'|',organization_id) is null,'',concat(organization,'|',organization_id)) as org_name  from temp where person_and_org is not null
select person_name as personName,org_name as organization,fruit_id as paper_id,author_sequence as index  from temp
select * from yancao.dg_paper
select ID as id_1,TITLE,AUTHOR_NAMES from   temp
SELECT id paper_id,ref_id,case when paper_ref_id is null then 1 else 0 end flag from temp

SELECT REPLACE  (REPLACE (ID,            chr(10),            ''), chr(13),                 '') REF_IDS,REPLACE  (REPLACE (TITLE,            chr(10),            ''), chr(13),                 '') TITLE ,REPLACE  (REPLACE (AUTHOR_NAMES,            chr(10),            ''), chr(13),                 '') AUTHOR_NAMES ,REPLACE  (REPLACE (DOI,            chr(10),            ''), chr(13),                 '') DOI ,REPLACE  (REPLACE (DATA_TYPE,            chr(10),            ''), chr(13),                 '') DATA_TYPE ,REPLACE  (REPLACE (journal_name,            chr(10),            ''), chr(13),                 '') journal_name,REPLACE  (REPLACE (year,            chr(10),            ''), chr(13),                 '') year,REPLACE  (REPLACE (issue,            chr(10),            ''), chr(13),                 '') issue,REPLACE  (REPLACE (OTHER_INFO,            chr(10),            ''), chr(13),                 '') OTHER_INFO    FROM DG_REFERENCE_20201027
select ref_ids  ref_id,case when id is null then id_1 else id  end paper_ref_id from temp
select ID,DOI from temp
select  id,REF_ID from temp LATERAL view  explode(split(REF_IDS,';')) t  as REF_ID
SELECT REF_IDS, TITLE , AUTHOR_NAMES , DOI , DATA_TYPE , journal_name, year, issue, OTHER_INFO    FROM temp
SELECT  *  from temp where DATA_TYPE='J'  or  DATA_TYPE='C'  or  DATA_TYPE='D'
SELECT REF_IDS REF_ID, TITLE , AUTHOR_NAMES , DOI , DATA_TYPE , journal_name, year, issue, OTHER_INFO, case when id is null then id_1 else id  end paper_id  FROM temp
select code,reference_num  from temp

select code ,paper_id ,paper_type ,language ,classification ,author ,org_name ,name ,alternative ,source ,collection_number ,abstract ,pdf_path ,abstract_alternative ,keyword ,doi ,journal_id ,journal_title_alternative ,issn ,issue_id ,issue_volume ,issue ,fund_id ,fund_name ,one_classification ,two_classification ,three_classification ,issue_year ,zw_reference ,range from yancao.paper
